Class CuratorStateStoreFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.curator.CuratorStateStore
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.kafka.upgrade.CuratorStateStoreFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateStore

    public class CuratorStateStoreFilter
extends CuratorStateStore
    CuratorStateStoreFilter enables to ignore task names that match the filter.

      • setIgnoreFilter

      • fetchTaskNames

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> fetchTaskNames()
                                                      throws StateStoreException
        Description copied from interface: StateStore
        Fetches all the Task names listed in the underlying storage. Note that these should always have a TaskInfo, but may lack TaskStatus.
        Specified by:
        fetchTaskNames in interface StateStore
        Overrides:
        fetchTaskNames in class CuratorStateStore
        Returns:
        All the Task names stored so far, or an empty list if none are found
        Throws:
        StateStoreException - when fetching the data fails
